c74object.name: mzed.moshpit
c74object.digest: A two-dimensional model of moshers, similar to a disordered gas
c74object.description: A two-dimensional model of moshers, similar to a disordered gas.

attribute.name: showForce
attribute.digest: Visualized force being applied to each individual mosher
attribute.description: Visualized force being applied to each individual mosher.

attribute.name: frameSkip
attribute.digest: Number of particle frames for each drawing frame
attribute.description: Number of particle frames for each drawing frame.

attribute.name: flock
attribute.digest: Propoerty of active moshes to stay together
attribute.description: Propoerty of active moshes to stay together.

attribute.name: noise
attribute.digest: How energetic the active moshers are
attribute.description: How energetic the active moshers are.

attribute.name: numMoshers
attribute.digest: How many moshers (active and passive) in the pit
attribute.description: How many moshers (active and passive) in the pit.
